meanings.definition: Giving a sense of happy satisfaction or enjoyment.
meanings.sent1: The flowers had a pleasant smell.
meanings.sent2: The music at the party was very pleasant.
meanings.sent3: The cat found a pleasant spot in the sun to nap.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as pleasant as a melody.
meanings.sent5: The warm breeze on the beach was truly pleasant.

meanings.definition: Agreeable to the senses or to the mind.
meanings.sent1: The cake had a pleasant taste.
meanings.sent2: The view from the top of the mountain was quite pleasant.
meanings.sent3: The movie had a pleasant surprise ending.
meanings.sent4: His words were as pleasant as a soothing balm.
meanings.sent5: The colors of the sunset painted a pleasant picture in the sky.
